text: Marking the 20th anniversary of her death, the Daily Mail's Weekend magazine still has one more unmissable tribute to come Advertisement Over the past three weeks in our groundbreaking series to mark the 20th anniversary of Diana â€™ s death, The Daily Mail's Weekend magazine brought you dozens of glorious photographs from her unseen album as well as the real stories behind her affairs, the disintegration of her marriage and her bitter rivalry with Camilla. Now Richard Kay and Geoffrey Levy, who have spent months talking to her closest friends, her family and those she confided in, many of whom only now feel able to speak freely for the first time, reveal her excitement as her fledgling relationship with Charles developed into a fairy - tale romance that captivated the nation, and how she yearned for more children after
